long_description: Celebrating 20 years of cycling style, Zoic introduces the Libertee 20 T-Shirt for men with mountain biking features such as built-in sun protection and a zippered stash pocket. Polyester fabric wicks and breathes with a soft feel that also stands up to outdoor abuse. Side-seam hip pocket with stealth zip closure is subtly placed to stash your shades, cell phone, music player or a snack. Pocket has slit for a headphone cord. Zoic Libertee 20 T-Shirt for men has a relaxed fit with a tagless neck label.
short_description: Celebrating 20 years of cycling style, Zoic introduces the Libertee 20 T-Shirt for men with mountain biking features such as built-in sun protection and a zippered stash pocket.
